keyword: how many calories in a tamal
title: How Many Calories Are in a Tamal?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in a tamal, including carbs, protein, fat, and full nutrition breakdown for one typical pork tamal, plus variations and FAQs.
h1: How Many Calories Are in a Tamal?
assumptions: Typical homemade pork tamal with corn masa dough, shredded pork filling, chili sauce; approx. 120 g total weight, steamed in corn husk; no added toppings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by filling (pork, chicken, cheese, veggies), size, recipe, and preparation method. Check labels for store-bought tamales.

quick_answer.text: One typical pork tamal contains about 223 calories and 8 g protein.

label_note: Values mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaged foods.

faqs.q: How many calories in a tamal with pork?
faqs.a: About 223 kcal for one standard pork tamal.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in a tamal?
faqs.a: Roughly 25 g carbs, including 3 g fiber from the corn masa.
Yes, around 500 mg per tamal due to seasonings and filling.

faqs.q: How does tamal size affect calories?
faqs.a: Larger tamales (150 g+) can have 250-300 kcal; smaller ones under 200 kcal.

faqs.q: What's the protein in one tamal?
faqs.a: Approximately 8 g, mostly from the meat filling.
